description: V2.3 B/T laws with radius-dependent bar/shear suppression, shear-coupled sigma_ring, and dynamic M_max(S, B/T)

M_max.comment: NEW V2.3: M_max now depends on both B/T and shear to prevent red roofs

lambda_ring.comment: Two-predictor lambda: shortened by bulge AND shear

comment_sigma: NEW V2.3: sigma_ring now coupled to shear - narrows in high-shear disks
comment_bar_taper: NEW V2.3: Radius-dependent bar suppression - taper ring beyond R_bar = 2.0 * R_d in SB/SAB
comment_shear_taper: NEW V2.3: Radius-dependent shear suppression - taper ring beyond R_shear = 2.5 * R_d in high-shear disks
notes: V2.3 adds three key improvements over V2.2:
1. Radius-dependent bar/shear tapers - suppress ring where bars/spirals lose coherence
2. Shear-coupled sigma_ring - narrow envelope in high-shear (Sc/Sbc) disks
3. Dynamic M_max(S, B/T) - prevent red roofs in bulgy or chaotic systems
- Bars dephase azimuthal paths BEYOND ~2 R_d (bar corotation)
- Strong spiral arms (high shear) destroy coherence OUTSIDE spiral region
- Global gates (g_bar, g_shear) say HOW MUCH, radial tapers say WHERE
- Reduce broad red plateaus in intermediate spirals
- Maintain good performance in early types and SAB galaxies
